abstract: Researchers reported that a combination of two drugs from Bristol-Myers Squibb appeared to shrink tumors in 41 percent of patients in a small study.
snippet: Researchers reported that a combination of two drugs from Bristol-Myers Squibb appeared to shrink tumors in 41 percent of patients in a small study.
lead_paragraph: Cancer researchers are growing increasingly enthusiastic about harnessing the body’s own immune system to fight tumors. And new research shows that two drugs that use this approach may be even better than one.

headline.main: Melanoma Treatment Harnesses Immune System to Combat Cancer Cells
headline.print_headline: Melanoma Treatment Harnesses Immune System to Combat Cancer Cells
